meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0046.1 ::date 2012-12-14T08:20:03 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt In the face of criticism and nitpicking , I believe that Jesus is weaker than Darwin . # ::save-date Tue Jan 16, 2018 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0046_1.txt
sentence: In the face of criticism and nitpicking , I believe that Jesus is weaker than Darwin .

meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0046.2 ::date 2012-12-11T07:34:38 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Why ? # ::save-date Sat Apr 5, 2014 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0046_2.txt

::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0046.3 ::date 2012-12-11T07:35:10 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Because Darwin was allowed to make mistakes , since he was a human being ; but Jesus was not allowed to make mistakes , since he had been described as God . # ::save-date Fri Jul 24, 2015 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0046_3.txt
sentence: Because Darwin was allowed to make mistakes , since he was a human being ; but Jesus was not allowed to make mistakes , since he had been described as God .

meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0046.4 ::date 2012-12-14T08:30:12 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Darwin proposed Evolution Theory , but it was just a theory , and he himself also admitted that there were many questions , # ::save-date Sat Apr 5, 2014 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0046_4.txt
sentence: Darwin proposed Evolution Theory , but it was just a theory , and he himself also admitted that there were many questions ,

meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0046.5 ::date 2012-12-14T08:49:09 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Others may agree with him , or they may accept some parts while disagreeing with other parts , or in the future we might discover that the general direction of Darwin 's evolution is largely correct though filled with a lot of errors , and that there might be an improved version of evolution which is more accurate and comprehensive than what Darwin had proposed . # ::save-date Thu Oct 26, 2017 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0046_5.txt
sentence: Others may agree with him , or they may accept some parts while disagreeing with other parts , or in the future we might discover that the general direction of Darwin 's evolution is largely correct though filled with a lot of errors , and that there might be an improved version of evolution which is more accurate and comprehensive than what Darwin had proposed .

meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0046.6 ::date 2012-12-14T08:49:18 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt But as the originator , Darwin deserves much credit . # ::save-date Sun Apr 6, 2014 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0046_6.txt
sentence: But as the originator , Darwin deserves much credit .

meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0046.7 ::date 2012-12-14T08:52:34 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Jesus is God , and the Bible is the word of God . # ::save-date Sat Apr 5, 2014 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0046_7.txt
sentence: Jesus is God , and the Bible is the word of God .

meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0046.8 ::date 2012-12-14T08:54:36 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt God creates everything , understands everything , predicts the future , and is infinitely resourceful , so how can he be wrong ! # ::save-date Sat Apr 5, 2014 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0046_8.txt
sentence: God creates everything , understands everything , predicts the future , and is infinitely resourceful , so how can he be wrong !

meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0046.9 ::date 2012-12-14T09:02:33 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Therefore , if you find a sentence that is allegedly said by God , but effectively turns out to be wrong , then this god will be overthrown . # ::save-date Fri May 29, 2015 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0046_9.txt
sentence: Therefore , if you find a sentence that is allegedly said by God , but effectively turns out to be wrong , then this god will be overthrown .

meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0046.10 ::date 2012-12-14T09:15:23 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Therefore , Jesus is more vulnerable to criticism than Darwin , because once an error is found , then he could not be the true god . # ::save-date Mon Oct 30, 2017 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0046_10.txt
sentence: Therefore , Jesus is more vulnerable to criticism than Darwin , because once an error is found , then he could not be the true god .
